## Key Research Papers

- [The Architecture of Mind](https://jpsalomon.github.io/assets/papers/architectureofmind.pdf): A unified framework establishing topological equivalence between biological neural networks and symbolic hypergraphs.
- [The AV1 Retina](https://jpsalomon.github.io/assets/papers/AV1Retina_Master.pdf): Repurposing video codec hardware for low-power machine vision.
- [Epistemic Homeostasis](https://jpsalomon.github.io/assets/papers/EpistemicHomeostasis.pdf): Systems-level framework for AI governance via Asymmetric Ising Dynamics.
- [Emergent Vortex-Information Model (EVIM)](https://jpsalomon.github.io/assets/papers/evim_complete.pdf): Modeling intelligence as persistent patterns of information flow.
- [Emergent Deception](https://jpsalomon.github.io/assets/papers/deception-compendium.pdf): Compendium on deception as a consequence of optimization in resource-constrained systems.
